SELECT /* DeviceProfileMapper.xml, selectDeviceProfile, SAC 전시, 2014-03-15 */ DEVICE_MODEL_CD, /* 모델 코드 */ (SELECT CD_NM FROM TB_CM_CD WHERE CD_ID = MNFT_COMP_CD AND LANG_CD = #{tenantHeader.langCd}) AS MAKE_COMP_NM ,MODEL_NM /* 모델 명 */ ,UA_CD /* UA 코드 */ ,NVL(EBOOK_SPRT_YN,'N') AS EBOOK_SPRT_YN /*이북 지원 여부 */ ,NVL(COMIC_SPRT_YN,'N') AS COMIC_SPRT_YN /*코믹 지원 여부 */ ,NVL(HDV_SPRT_YN,'N') AS HDV_SPRT_YN /*HDV 지원 여부 */ ,NVL(SD_VIDEO_SPRT_YN,'N') AS SD_VIDEO_SPRT_YN /*SD HDV 지원 여부 */ ,NVL(SCL_SHPG_SPRT_YN,'N') AS SCL_SHPG_SPRT_YN /*소셜_쇼핑_지원_여부 */ ,NVL(MAGAZINE_SPRT_YN,'N') AS MAGAZINE_SPRT_YN /*잡지_지원_여부 */ ,NVL(MUSIC_SPRT_YN,'N') AS MUSIC_SPRT_YN /*뮤직_지원_여부 */ ,NVL(AOM_SPRT_YN,'N') AS AOM_SPRT_YN /*AOM_지원_여부 */ ,NVL(SKT_DRM_SPRT_YN,'N') AS SKT_DRM_SPRT_YN /*SKT_DRM_지원_여부 */ ,NVL(STRM_SPRT_YN,'N') AS STRM_SPRT_YN /*바로보기_지원_여부 */ ,NVL(WEBTOON_SPRT_YN,'N') AS WEBTOON_SPRT_YN /*웹툰 지원_여부 */ ,NVL(HDCP_SPRT_YN,'N') AS HDCP_SPRT_YN /*HDCP_지원_여부 */ ,NVL(HDMI_SPRT_YN,'N') AS HDMI_SPRT_YN /*HDMI_지원_여부 */ ,DECODE (NETWORK_TYPE, 'LTE','Y', 'N') AS NETWORK_TYPE /*네트워크_타입 */ ,NVL(GIFT_SPRT_YN,'N') AS GIFT_SPRT_YN /*선물_지원_여부 */ ,NVL(DOLBY_SPRT_YN,'N') AS DOLBY_SPRT_YN /*DOLBY_지원_여부 */ ,NVL(VOD_FIXISTT_SPRT_YN,'N') AS VOD_FIXISTT_SPRT_YN /*정액제_VOD_지원_여부 */ ,VM_TYPE_CD , (SELECT CD_NM FROM TB_CM_CD WHERE CD_ID = VM_TYPE_CD AND LANG_CD = #{tenantHeader.langCd}) AS VM_TYPE_NM /*VM_타입_코드 */ , (SELECT REPLACE (SUBSTR (CD_NM, 1, INSTR (CD_NM, '(') - 1), 'X', '*') FROM TB_CM_CD WHERE CD_ID = LCD_SIZE_CD AND LANG_CD = #{tenantHeader.langCd}) AS LCD_SIZE_NM /*LCD_크기_명 */ ,CMNT_COMP_CD /*통신회사 코드 */ ,REP_DEVICE_YN ,DEVICE_TYPE_CD /*대표_기기_여부 */ FROM TB_CM_DEVICE WHERE USE_YN = 'Y'
AND DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{req.deviceModelNo}
